info.title: ApiManagementClient
info.description: Use these REST APIs for performing operations on the ApiVersionSet entity associated with your Azure API Management deployment. Using this entity you create and manage API Version Sets that are used to group APIs for consistent versioning.

get.description: Lists a collection of API Version Sets in the specified service instance.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: |   Field     |     Usage     |     Supported operators     |     Supported functions     |</br>|-------------|-------------|-------------|-------------|</br>

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of records to return.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of records to skip.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Lists a collection of Api Version Set entities.

schema.description: Paged Api Version Set list representation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the details of the Api Version Set specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: versionSetId
parameters.description: Api Version Set identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Gets the specified Api Version Set entity.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or Updates a Api Version Set.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: versionSetId
parameters.description: Api Version Set identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. Not required when creating an entity, but required when updating an entity.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

versioningScheme.description: An value that determines where the API Version identifer will be located in a HTTP request.

properties.description: Properties of an API Version Set.

type.description: Resource type for API Management resource.

200.description: Api Version Set was successfully updated.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

201.description: Api Version Set was successfully created.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: versionSetId
parameters.description: Api Version Set identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: The ApiVersion Set details were successfully deleted.

204.description: The ApiVersion Set details were successfully deleted.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

head.description: Gets the entity state (Etag) version of the Api Version Set specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: versionSetId
parameters.description: Api Version Set identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

200.description: Specified Api Version Set entity exists and current entity state version is present in the ETag header.

ETag.description: Current entity state version. Should be treated as opaque and used to make conditional HTTP requests.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates the details of the Api VersionSet specified by its identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the resource group.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the API Management service.

parameters.name: versionSetId
parameters.description: Api Version Set identifier. Must be unique in the current API Management service instance.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: ETag of the Entity. ETag should match the current entity state from the header response of the GET request or it should be * for unconditional update.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of the API to be used with the client request.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

versioningScheme.description: An value that determines where the API Version identifer will be located in a HTTP request.

properties.description: Properties used to create or update an API Version Set.

schema.description: Parameters to update or create an Api Version Set Contract.

204.description: The Api Version Set details were successfully updated.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
